summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to fire fighting vehicles; authorizing the transfer of certain municipally-owned fire fighting vehicles from the Fire Department to the Department of Administrative Services; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1990 Budget of the Department of Administrative Services; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; authorizing the Director of Administrative Services and the City Comptroller to issue obligations of the City to provide alternative financing for such acquisitions, and declaring an emergency therefor.
